name: Amass — Clean Up!
description:
Everybody who scores a certain number of points in a single game wins a luxury car!

Play Amass — an engaging and fun game that challenges your skills. Win incredible real-life prizes by playing and winning. No purchase is necessary to enter or win. Participation is completely free.

The prizes you can win are ranging from sneakers to exotic supercars and luxury real estate worth hundreds of thousands of $.

HOW TO PLAY:
Control the direction of the ball by tapping the screen. Avoid falling out of the black line. Try to survive for as long as you can.

By downloading this app, you unconditionally agree to be bound by Amass Rules and other legal documents located at www.playamass.com/legal.html.

Neither this game nor any prizes or contests presented are not affiliated or sponsored by Apple in any way.

Amass Privacy Policy and Terms of Use are available below:
https://www.playamass.com/legal.html
